price: 19 qui ne te seront d’aucun secours contre Allah[1271]. Les impies se soutiennent les uns les autres, tandis qu’Allah est le soutien des pieux croyants.
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يُغۡنُواْ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: [1271] Si tu te pliais à leurs désirs.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innahum lan yugh'nū ʿanka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna al-ẓālimīna baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqīna
